Description: Join us on a journey to revolutionize clinical research programs with decentralized collective intelligence. See decentralization in motion with the SOPHiA DDM™ Platform, designed to connect and integrate multimodal data from 750+ institutions across 70 countries. Learn how to unlock the platform's potential to identify unmet needs, accelerate precision medicine development, and improve patient access to new therapies by securely sharing knowledge on a global scale. Discover how SOPHiA DDM™ continues to drive and accelerate the adoption of homologous recombination deficiency (HRD) analysis and our decentralized approach to MSK-ACCESS.
SearchResultBody: ESP01E. Decentralization and Collective Intelligence: Pioneering a New Era in Precision Medicine
Title: Decentralization and Collective Intelligence: Pioneering a New Era in Precision Medicine
